meanings.sent1: The group of chuckleheads at the party kept telling bad jokes.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to those chuckleheads; they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The chuckleheads thought it was a good idea to try to fit a watermelon in a mailbox.
meanings.sent4: The chuckleheads in the movie stumbled around like clueless clowns.
meanings.sent5: The image of the chuckleheads wearing mismatched socks stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: To behave in a silly or foolish manner.
meanings.sent1: Stop chuckleheads around and focus on your work.
meanings.sent2: The children chuckleheads during recess, enjoying their playtime.
meanings.sent3: We chuckleheads through the park, pretending to be pirates on a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The students chuckleheads in the classroom, disrupting the lesson.
meanings.sent5: The comedian chuckleheads on stage, making the audience burst into laughter.
